title: Samaritan - Person Of Interest
summary: Animated Samaritan UI LiveWallpaper base on the TV show Person Of Interest
description: Animated Samaritan UI WatchFace for Android Wear & LiveWallpaper base on the TV show Person Of InterestFor the LiveWallpaper, you can change:- The background colour. (White and Black)- The phrase display by Samaritan with one of the following      :  WHAT ARE YOUR COMMANDS ?      :  I WILL PROTECT YOU NOW      :  CALCULATING RESPONSE      :  INVESTIGATION ONGOING      :  FIND THE MACHINE- and more ....For the WatchFace , you can change:- The background colour. (White and Black)- between blod and regular font- 12/24 hours modeThis application is not affiliated, associated, or in any way officially connected with CBS, or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates. CBS's Person Of Interest is a registered trademark of CBS
descriptionHTML:
Animated Samaritan UI WatchFace for Android Wear & LiveWallpaper
base on the TV show Person Of Interest

For the LiveWallpaper, you can change:

- The background colour. (White and Black)
- The phrase display by Samaritan with one of the following
: WHAT ARE YOUR COMMANDS ?
: I WILL PROTECT YOU NOW
: CALCULATING RESPONSE
: INVESTIGATION ONGOING
: FIND THE MACHINE
- and more ....

For the WatchFace , you can change:
- The background colour. (White and Black)
- between blod and regular font
- 12/24 hours mode

This application is not affiliated, associated, or in any way officially connected with CBS, or any of its subsidiaries or its affiliates. CBS's Person Of Interest is a registered trademark of CBS
comments: Amazing!! This guy is a genius! I hope you can make one for The Machine aswell! That would be insane. Keep up the good work. Hopefully in next update we can run it under lockscreen aswell

Very nice, but could be improved I'm loving the wall paper but as previous comments mentioned would be awesome to input your own lines and the line goes through the time on my moto 360. Fix those and it'll be 5 starts...
Perfect just android wear support pls Dont stop support because this is awsome wallpaper.  Just if you can make smartwatch face with words and clock pls :)

Brilliant Huge huge fan of the show. Absolutely love this app. I wish I could set it as my lock screen though. Would love for someone to try and use my phone only to see 's are being watched' appear. The look on their face would be amazing

Very cool, but... Could be much cooler with built in search functionality. Wonder if it would be possible to integrate with google to perform phone tasks. Just like using S voice on samsung, but without the voice, just the text.

This is very cool. I'm a huge fan of the show so this just made my day.  Looking forward to more updates though...is it possible to get a clock for the phone itself w/out the Android wear?  Something that we could use say for an alarm clock?
recentChanges: - Display phrase on touch display option
- Make the line under the text longer option
- Animate the triangle when words come up
